Abstract: This abstract provides an overview of Sir Partha Dasgupta's seminal work in environmental and development economics, as reflected in his autobiography. Dasgupta's pioneering research has significantly contributed to the field of environmental economics, highlighting the need for sustainable development and the importance of intergenerational equity. His work has also explored the intersection of development economics and environmental economics, emphasizing the need for policies that balance economic growth with environmental protection. Dasgupta's autobiography offers a unique insight into his thought process and the evolution of his ideas, providing a comprehensive understanding of his contributions to the field. The book serves as a testament to his commitment to sustainability and his dedication to promoting environmentally conscious development. Through his work, Dasgupta has inspired a new generation of economists to prioritize the well-being of the planet and its inhabitants.
